thread.title: New Balance Taps BEAMS for Premium 998 Collaboration
thread.title_full: New Balance Taps BEAMS for Premium 998 Collaboration

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: New Balance Taps BEAMS for Premium 998 Collaboration
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
Brand: New Balance, BEAMS
Model: 998
Key Features: Suede and mesh upper, reflective 3M accents, co-branded footbeds, “BOSTON” and “TOKYO” embroidery on the heels.
Release Date: March 31, 2017
Price: As for now, no price details have been disclosed.
Availability: The BEAMS x New Balance 998 is due to arrive in Japan later this month.
Editor’s Notes: Japan’s BEAMS has joined with New Balance for a special bespoke take on the 998 , made in the U.S. The co-branded sneaker boasts premium construction, with nods to both Boston and Tokyo being appropriately implemented.
Subscribe to Highsnobiety’s sneaker chatbot on Facebook to receive lightning quick updates on release dates, sneaker street style, shopping tips and more.
